Description: Blue-green glazed steatite scarab, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, feathered legs cut through, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed with 2 cartouches containing prenomen and nomen.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (2451)
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 27 Oct -27 Jan, France, Musee de Grenoble, Amon to Thebes
Condition: fair (incomplete -sections of base and legs missing)
